_A.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

UtilityStatement.description: A supplement to an Invoice or Credit Note, containing information on the consumption of services provided by utility suppliers to private and public customers, including electricity, gas, water, and telephone services.

UtilityStatement.title: Utility Statement. Details
UtilityStatement.description: A supplement to an Invoice or Credit Note, containing information on the consumption of services provided by utility suppliers to private and public customers, including electricity, gas, water, and telephone services.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Utility Statement. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Utility Statement. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Utility Statement. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Utility Statement. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Utility Statement. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

CopyIndicator.title: Utility Statement. Copy_ Indicator. Indicator
CopyIndicator.description: Indicates whether this document is a copy (true) or not (false).

UUID.title: Utility Statement. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

IssueDate.title: Utility Statement. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Utility Statement. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

UtilityStatementTypeCode.title: Utility Statement. Utility Statement Type Code. Code
UtilityStatementTypeCode.description: A code signifying the type of Utility Statement.

Note.title: Utility Statement. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

DocumentCurrencyCode.title: Utility Statement. Document_ Currency Code. Code
DocumentCurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the default currency for this document.

AccountingCostCode.title: Utility Statement. Accounting Cost Code. Code
AccountingCostCode.description: The buyer's accounting cost code, applied to the UtilityStatement.

AccountingCost.title: Utility Statement. Accounting Cost. Text
AccountingCost.description: The buyer's accounting cost code, applied to the UtilityStatement, expressed as text.

ParentDocumentReference.title: Utility Statement. Parent_ Document Reference. Document Reference
ParentDocumentReference.description: A reference to the parent Invoice or Credit Note.

AdditionalDocumentReference.title: Utility Statement. Additional_ Document Reference. Document Reference
AdditionalDocumentReference.description: A reference to an additional document associated with this document.

Signature.title: Utility Statement. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.

CustomerParty.title: Utility Statement. Customer Party
CustomerParty.description: The buyer, if different from the receiver of the document.

SubscriberParty.title: Utility Statement. Subscriber_ Party. Party
SubscriberParty.description: The subscriber (user or receiver of the service), if different from the buyer and from the party receiving this document.

MainOnAccountPayment.title: Utility Statement. Main_ On Account Payment. On Account Payment

SubscriberConsumption.title: Utility Statement. Subscriber Consumption
SubscriberConsumption.description: A utility statement for a particular consumption point.
